wikipedia_page.main: John Westcott (born 31 May 1979) is an English retired professional footballer.

response: Westcott was educated at Wandsworth Grammar School, the City and Guilds College, both in London, and the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. His career began in radar research during World War II. After a year in Germany with the Allied Commission, he obtained a scholarship to the MIT where many scientists returning from the services were addressing the early possibilities of computer applications.John Westcott Obituary The Guardian
